Name: 最后的巫后：众王纷争的年代 Witch Queen
About the game: Witch Queen is a single-player, independently developed, light-weight story-oriented real-time strategy game that tells the dark ages of the fantasy world of Isefaya.You will experience a magical era where humans, dragons and gods co-exist. In here, you can build countries, train armies, explore the continent, witness the endings of the Wizards, and learn the truth behind the story. Game Features Open Map: Unlike the traditional RTS games, you can explore and play on a large seamless map here, without switching maps and starting over the construction or expansion. Thrilling Storyline: Since after the great war,Lord of Miracles Amy Tio has been ruling the wizards. However, the birth of the Daughter of Prophecy has broken the long-lasting peace of Isefaia. Now everything's changed, the sealed awakened,the daughter of Witch Queen returned, multiple forces rose, all these signs are foreshadowing another great war...... Hand-drawn Fantasy Dark World: about 100 units with different forms, over 120 magnificent buildings, 7 major witch factions, over 110 epic musics. Simple and Easy to Learn: optimized for the complex operating system of traditional RTS games, even players who have never played RTS games can get the hang of this game in minutes. Legendary Heroes: over 10 heroes that have their own powerful magical skills to impact the battlefield situation. RPG Elements: upgrade heroes, reinforce buildings, unlock new troops and learn new skills as you keep playing. Control the Overall Situation: we have map capture mechanism and battle micromanagement in the gameplay. Allocate the resources reasonably, build the base strategically, train the troops, take advantage of troop features and heroes' powerful skills, to win the final victory. Various Gameplays: In addition to the storyline mode, the game also has the 9 modes of skirmish, blitzkrieg, snatch, free-for-all, summoning,etc. meeting the needs of different players.
